content: CPF Asked by Weng FaiAsked 3w agoHow will the CPF bonus interest, for under 55yo, be calculated in my case?I am under 55, and if I have $0 in OA, but $60,000 in SA, will I still receive the bonus 1% for the $60,000 in SA or only for $40,000 due to the "up to $20,000 in OA" condition?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Hariz Arthur Maloy, Independent Financial Advisor at Promiseland IndependentTop Contributor (Sep)Level 9. God of WisdomAnswered 3w agoYou'll get the bonus. It's OA (max 20k) + SA + MA = 60K to get the additional 600 per year in SA.1 comment4
